response.original_title: YOKO TAKAHASHI EVANGELION Ultimate Live「月十夜」
response.overview: On Sunday, May 28, 2023, YOKO TAKAHASHI, known for singing the theme song of the TV anime "Neon Genesis Evangelion", performed a live concert "YOKO TAKAHASHI EVANGELION Ultimate Live "Tsuki Juuya" at Zepp Shinjuku (TOKYO).  It is part of the "EVANGELION KABUKICHO IMPACT" project held at "Tokyo Kabukicho Tower," which opened on April 14th. This is her FIRST solo performance based on the "Evangelion" series.  Guests include pianist Marassi, who has been viewed over 700 MILLION TIMES on YouTube, violinist Shizuka Kashima, saxophonist Hiroshi Matsushita, and other INTERNATIONALLY ACTIVE performers appear on stage.
response.title: YOKO TAKAHASHI EVANGELION Ultimate Live - Tsuki Juuya

titles.title: YOKO TAKAHASHI EVANGELION Ultimate Live「月十夜」
